Title: La Migra
Writer: Mark Maine (story and screenplay), Mike Terrell (story and screenplay)
Actors: Michael Copon, Antoinette Kalaj, John Patrick Jordan, Marco RodrÃ­guez
Plot: Love is tested within criminal violence. A childhood crush defines these two from a border town. Romance blossoms as they stand on opposite sides of the law. They strive to untangle the web that threatens their romance and lives.
